data.prayer: Please, teach the 198,791 believers in Suhaj, Egypt how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Suhaj, Egypt

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Suhaj, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Suhaj, Egypt. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 388,001 cultural Christians in the state of Suhaj to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Chechen people.
Spirit, encourage the church in Suhaj, Egypt to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 198,791 believers living in Suhaj, Egypt.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Suhaj, Egypt into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
